Для обучения Welcome to Search Game! In this game you have to take tests on various topics. I hope, you like it. Understandably Question OK, now I will show you a small diagram of what and where. Try again Go back Well Answer option 1 Answer option 2 Answer option 3 Understood Now you know everything, let\'s answer one question. Let\'s go
Where is Yandex registered? How many requests are processed per month? What place does Yandex rank among all search engines in Russia? Where is Yandex headquarters in Moscow located? Does Yandex have anything to do with education? What year was the Google search engine founded? Who owns the Google search engine? Does Google have voice search capabilities? Does Google have a built-in calculator? What year was Wikipoisk launched? What OPs does Safari include? Why was Safari created? Does Safari have a pop-up blocker? Does Safari have a feature to search for text on a page? Does Safari have a reading mode?
Yandex is a Russian company registered in the Netherlands. Yandex is an American company registered there. Yandex is a company registered in Moscow.
6.3 billion per month (date: early 2014). 5 billion per month (date: early 2014). 7 billion per month (date: early 2014).
First place in Russia. Second place in Russia. Yandex is not a Russian company.
Lev Tolstoy Street, 16. Gamerskaya street, house 7. Lesnaya street, houses 22.
